title: Mainly monkeys. Koalas and co
creator_credit: Victoria. Dept. of Education and Early Childhood Development, Rob McCubbin and Louise Jonas
brief_description: Contains two programmes filmed at Melbourne Zoo. 1.”Mainly monkeys” shows the social behaviour of groups of monkeys and other primates that live in trees. 2.”Koalas and Co.” observes some Australian animals adapted for life in trees, such as koalas, fruit bats, tree frogs and lizards. Both programmes are non-narrated, making use of natural sound.
